value:
Claim victory in consecutive battles to
earn points! Score a lot of points to
gain the 5★ Hero as your ally!

You can earn rewards like Orbs
and powerful Sacred Seals!

Achieve the Target Score to earn
a bonus to your Cumulative Score!

Target Score       Cumulative Score
150　　　           +300
250　　　           +500
350　　　           +1,000
450　　　           +2,000
600　　　           +3,000

(Whether Target Score was reached
is checked before points are tripled.)
